forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
